name: Candy Sweet Journey
description:
An Addictive game for puzzle and match 3 lovers!

Have two modes Arcade and Endless modes.
- Arcade with more than 250 levels, easy and fun to play, yet challenging to fully master.
- Endless mode is classic puzzle game style.
- Beautiful Graphics
- Great Music and Sound Effects

Game Play:
- Sweep candy tile to match 3 or more candy identical.
- Match the candy until the board transparency, the star will appear.
- The star down to last line, you will pass the level.
